publ: by Belmont University Drug Information Center
name: CredibleHealthSources
0:
”Alexa open credible health sources”
”what about a good site for diabetes”
”where can i go for information for heart condition health”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: credible health sources
des:
This Alexa skill is to help direct patients to credible health resources for various health care topics. Topics include a wide range, such as diabetes, vaccines, infectious diseases, weight loss, etc. This skill is to help direct patients to reliable websites and sources to get the information they need about their health. 
This skill is for educational purposes only, and users should refer to their health care provider for any individual recommendation or treatments.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
